name: Emergency Princess
description:
Objective: 

Play as Princess Zipporah, the Princess of Gathering and find the other 9 Godly Princesses, and save them from the Evil Dragon!

1) Ester - Princess of Bravery

2) Ruth - Princess of Faithfulness

3) Sheba - Princess of Truth-seeking

4) Lydia - Princess of Entrepreneurship

5) Deborah - Princess of Leadership

6) Rahab - Princess of Adoption

7) Jehosheba - Princess of Protecting

8) Hannah - Princess of Prayer

9) Eve - Princess of Motherhood

How to Play:

WSAD Keys - Move around

Mouse - Move Camera

Left Mouse - Attack

Right Mouse - Roll

Spacebar - Jump

ESC - Pause

Up / Down Arrows + Enter - Select while Paused

Created for the 2021 CGDC SpeedGame Hard Mode - Theme of Light vs Darkness / A Game By its Cover 2021 - between 8-28-2021 to 8-29-2021

Original NES / Famicom cover art created by:

Rene James

twitter.com/mellowmelonpan

For the 2019 My Famicase Exhibition

https://famicase.com/19/softs/052.html
